name: Weeb For Speeb
description:
** Awarded "The Smooth Feat Rob Tomas" by Game Cheif @thatsaspicygame **

"Weeb For Speeb" was made by myself and Ellie Balson (@Bideobames) in 2 weeks for our friends Art Trash Party Potluck.

Its a purely tongue and cheek platformer with a light dating element and big anime vibes.

Programming and Music

Aaran Gicquel - @insolegames

Art, Level Design and Writting

Ellie Balson - @bideobames

https://bideobames.itch.io/

Big thanks to our friends at Potluck for displaying our game to drunk people..

https://twitter.com/PotLvckCo
